resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.

fields.description:
I've noticed that some of the reboot instance tests in CI are resulting in terminated instances. 
I was able to reproduce manually by running an instance and attempting repeated reboots of the instance, and on the 2nd or 3rd attempt the instance usually transitions to terminated. (I believe CI only attempts a single reboot). 

This is a VPC system, and the install is about a week old, upgrading now to retest. 
Thanks, 
-M

{code}

Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.2.0
Release     : 0.0.23697.586.20150723git4d5856b.el6

{code}

comments.body: [~mclark], I just rebooted an instances 7 times on VPC set up and it was ok. Do you have stable reproduction steps?

[~vasya] thanks for looking into this one. I haven't dug into this much further but this system (and maybe image/EMI) has  been reproducing this pretty regularly today if you'd like to use/compare?
Thanks!
-M

[~mclark], I started an instances from the same emi (emi-8fe53461) on your set up and rebooted it 4 times without an issue.

Update...
I have a new VPC setup with recent code and will continue to try narrowing down the steps to reproduce.
Worth noting that this popped up in another VPC setup run by [~nurmi] on dev branch (network-vpc) today :
http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/eutester-test-instance-suite/5556/parsed_console/

Thanks, 
-M

Quick update. I have not been able to reproduce this on a newer setup. I've tried repeated reboots of HVM instance-store instances, as well as EBS backed reboots and stop/start. In addition to more recent code, the cloud Im testing on now has multiple nodes which is a different than the original single node topo used when opening this issue. 
I haven't seen this pop in the recent CI tests either.
Closing. Will re-open if it's reproduced in more recent code.
